name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior IT Engineer with over 13 years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in deploying cloud solutions on **AWS**, and **ESXI**, with hands-on experience in **Linux** and **BSD** environments. Strong skills in ITIL practices, troubleshooting, and problem-solving, essential for maintaining robust system infrastructure.

Accomplished in team management with a proven ability to lead cross-functional teams. Experienced in utilizing tools such as **Grafana**, **ElasticSearch**, and **Splunk** for monitoring and logging, ensuring optimal system performance. Skilled in secure networking using **OpenVPN**, **IPSec**, and **WireGuard**, and implementing firewall solutions with **pfSense**. 

Additionally, well-versed in modern software development techniques with a technical background in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, leveraging frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven expertise in developing AI/ML-driven platforms and deploying microservices architectures, ensuring systems are compliant with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
